name: Entomophobia (itch)
description:
@skslucher

Ludum Dare 31: "Entire Game on One Screen"

Post-Jam version

The latest game from a certain company for a discontinued portable console. And it's all about arthropods! How lovely!

You play the main character, called by some name or another, whom you must guide in her quest to cleanse the world of nasty icky gooey bugs. With her trusty crossbow by her side and your steady fingers, you will soon have to face the dreaded king of arthropods, who rises from the oceans in defiance of your exterminatory goals!
